t: Generic, branded or own brand?
s: If we list them under our own brand does that brand need to be trademarked and then brand registered with Amazon. Thanks for any help. ... Just to make it clear - generic on Amazon means no brand or design of product for which somebody has trademark/design/patent registration.

t: 21 Generic Brands Owned by Amazon
s: April 18, 2022 - In recent years, the retail giant has amassed dozens of private brands and other product collections that are exclusive to Amazon — basically, forms of generic brands or house brands.

t: Generic Brand Amazon: Exploring the Potential with FBA
s: November 8, 2024 - A generic brand on Amazon refers to products sold without a specific brand name or trademark. These items are typically unbranded or carry non-exclusive branding, allowing multiple sellers to offer the same product. In the context of Amazon, “Brand Generic” is often used when creating product ...

t: r/AmazonSeller on Reddit: Selling under Generic Brand?
Branded Items being listed as Generic
s: Amazon told us in writing we can list a brand as generic. Our supplier said we could list their brand a generic. Why because Brand Registry is full of fake brands. The catalog is full of duplicate listing. Amazon is a very big mess and the amazon gods have out done themselves leaving chaos.

t: Amazon
s: Generic products are unbranded products that do not belong to any identifiable brand, and should use the string “generic” for the brand name field when creating a new listing. If you create a new product listing with the brand name “generic” or its local translation, other sellers won’t ...

t: Can you sell generic items on Amazon? - Riverbend Consulting
s: December 18, 2024 - Generic items on Amazon are unbranded items with no recognizable name or logo. Think of them as the “no-name” goods on store shelves—functional but lacking that extra appeal from a trusted brand. Generic items typically come from manufacturers who mass-produce items and sell them in bulk ...

t: Why New Sellers Should Build A Generic Brand - Sellbrite
s: June 12, 2018 - When I started out on Amazon, I had a supplier called DBL Distributors. Once I got up and running, I had over 10,000 products for sale. My brand name was generic, which helped me maintain my image of diversity.

t: How Do I Change Generic Brand Name to My Brand?

t: Branded product listed as Generic - Amazon Seller Central
s: There’s a product that is listed on Amazon UK with brand “Generic”. However, the product clearly belongs to a specific brand. I purchased a few units of the product from a wholesale supplier thinking that since the product is listed under generic brand, anyone could sell on it.

t: How to Check Amazon Products for Generic brand? | Help Center | Seller Assistant
s: You would see a "GB" icon next to "like" and "dislike" icons. If you hover over it you will see crucial data why this listing could cause problems with Amazon. Moreover you are able to see if the product belong to "Generic" or "Unknown" brand in our Quick View feature.
